revised_title: Roman Inscriptions and Antiquities in Yorkshire
tldr: The author, Christopher Hunter, shares his findings on Roman inscriptions and antiquities in Yorkshire. He discusses the Roman station at Ebchester, its history, and the inscriptions found there. He also mentions other sites, such as the Bower and Housesteads, and their significance in Roman history.
scientific_discipline: Social Sciences, Art, and Humanities > Archaeology
